lexUnit.name: beard.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a growth of hair on the chin and lower cheeks of a man's face.

sentence.text: Sure enough , down the steps another group was approaching , and Pugwash shook with fright as he recognised the heavy shape and huge beard of his greatest enemy .
